mapper.sql: THREAD_ID, EVENT_ID, END_EVENT_ID, EVENT_NAME, STATE, TRX_ID, GTID, XID_FORMAT_ID, XID_GTRID, XID_BQUAL, XA_STATE, SOURCE, TIMER_START, TIMER_END, TIMER_WAIT, ACCESS_MODE, ISOLATION_LEVEL, AUTOCOMMIT, NUMBER_OF_SAVEPOINTS, NUMBER_OF_ROLLBACK_TO_SAVEPOINT, NUMBER_OF_RELEASE_SAVEPOINT, OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN, NESTING_EVENT_ID, NESTING_EVENT_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from events_transactions_history
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into events_transactions_history (THREAD_ID, EVENT_ID, END_EVENT_ID, EVENT_NAME, STATE, TRX_ID, GTID, XID_FORMAT_ID, XID_GTRID, XID_BQUAL, XA_STATE, SOURCE, TIMER_START, TIMER_END, TIMER_WAIT, ACCESS_MODE, ISOLATION_LEVEL, AUTOCOMMIT, NUMBER_OF_SAVEPOINTS, NUMBER_OF_ROLLBACK_TO_SAVEPOINT, NUMBER_OF_RELEASE_SAVEPOINT, OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN, NESTING_EVENT_ID, NESTING_EVENT_TYPE) values (#{threadId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{endEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{trxId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gtid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xidFormatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xidGtrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xidBqual,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xaState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timerStart,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{timerEnd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{timerWait,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accessMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isolationLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{autocommit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{numberOfSavepoints,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{numberOfRollbackToSavepoint,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{numberOfReleaseSavepoint,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{objectInstanceBegin,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nestingEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nestingEventType,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update events_transactions_history
THREAD_ID = #{row.threadId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
EVENT_ID = #{row.eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
END_EVENT_ID = #{row.endEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
EVENT_NAME = #{row.eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{row.state,jdbcType=CHAR},
TRX_ID = #{row.trxId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GTID = #{row.gtid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XID_FORMAT_ID = #{row.xidFormatId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
XID_GTRID = #{row.xidGtrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XID_BQUAL = #{row.xidBqual,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XA_STATE = #{row.xaState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE = #{row.source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIMER_START = #{row.timerStart,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TIMER_END = #{row.timerEnd,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TIMER_WAIT = #{row.timerWait,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ACCESS_MODE = #{row.accessMode,jdbcType=CHAR},
ISOLATION_LEVEL = #{row.isolationLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTOCOMMIT = #{row.autocommit,jdbcType=CHAR},

NUMBER_OF_ROLLBACK_TO_SAVEPOINT = #{row.numberOfRollbackToSavepoint,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NUMBER_OF_RELEASE_SAVEPOINT = #{row.numberOfReleaseSavepoint,jdbcType=BIGINT},

NESTING_EVENT_ID = #{row.nestingEventId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NESTING_EVENT_TYPE = #{row.nestingEventType,jdbcType=CHAR},
